abstract: From millions of social media posts, to decades of legal text-more and more relevant information is hidden in digital text corpora that are too large for manual analyses. The key promise of machine learning is to automate parts of the manual analysis …

abstract: Automated analysis of retinal images is a crucial diagnostic method for the early detection of disorders affecting the eyes, such as glaucoma, diabetic macula edema (DME), and retinopathy brought on by diabetes. The current study introduces a …
